attributes.action: A&E Closure at the Princess Royal Hospital Telford
attributes.additional_details:
This petition is to stop the proposed closures of A&E services at either The Princess Royal and Copthorne at Telford and Shrewsbury respectively.

The trust is bizarrely considering closure of one of the hospitals departments leaving the other to handle both towns, surely we are risking lives for the sake of a few pounds and that cuts, if they have to be made should be made elsewhere.
